content: DIfromPI93, LOOKING FOR DI'S ATTNEDING REUNION NEXT MONTH?
reply: DIfromPI93, LOOKING FOR DI'S ATTNEDING REUNION NEXT MONTH?
title: WHO's GOING TO DI REUNION @ PARRIS ISLAND; APRIL 2009

content: Hmmmm....I didn't even know there was one. I always thought about joining the DI Association, but didn't while I was there. It would be interesting to attend, though. Thanks! A veteran - whether active duty, retired, National Guard or Reserve - is someone who, at one point in his or her life, wrote a blank check made payable to "The United States of America" for an amount of "up to and including my life." That is honor, and there are way too many people in this country who no longer understand that - Author unknown.
